meanings.definition: A person who attends the same school as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My schoolfellow and I walk to school together every morning.
meanings.sent2: I have known my schoolfellow since we were in kindergarten.
meanings.sent3: During lunch, my schoolfellow accidentally packed my sandwich instead of theirs.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of students, my schoolfellow stands out with their bright smile.
meanings.sent5: The bond between schoolfellows can last a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: My schoolfellow and I are partners for the science project.
meanings.sent2: Every schoolfellow in our class contributed to the charity fundraiser.
meanings.sent3: When the teacher announced a surprise test, my schoolfellow groaned loudly.
meanings.sent4: As the bell rang, my schoolfellow dashed out of the classroom in excitement.
meanings.sent5: The schoolyard echoed with the laughter of schoolfellows playing together.
